channel.title: Hmmm, How Would I Do This? [VB6]
channel.description:
[img]http://img154.imageshack.us/img154/1502/vbhlpqs5.png[/img]
ok web 1 would have an URL it would be set on and button 1 would always be there, any way what i want to do it the following
ok what i want to do is have the button there but now the 'web 1' when the application is bieng used, but i want the web 1 to appear only when the button is pressed, then i want the web 1 to go away when the buton is pressed again...how?

item.title: Hmmm, How Would I Do This? [VB6]
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

Private Sub Command1_Click()
If WebBrowser1.Visible = False Then
WebBrowser1.Visible = True
WebBrowser1.Navigate “www.runescape.com”
ElseIf WebBrowser1.Visible = True Then
WebBrowser1.Visible = False
End If
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Load()
WebBrowser1.Visible = False
End Sub

Read full topic
